import React from "react"; import imagePath from "../constants/imagePath"; import InputField from "./InputField"; import "./Form.css"; import ButtonField from "./ButtonField"; interface FormProps { handleInputChange?: (field: any) => (event: React.ChangeEvent) => void; handleProfileChange?: (event: React.ChangeEvent) => void; handleResumeChange?: (event: React.ChangeEvent) => void; onSave?: () => void; } const AddEmployeeForm: React.FC = ({ handleProfileChange, handleResumeChange, handleInputChange, onSave }) => { return (
Add Employee
{onSave&&onSave()}} />
); }; export default AddEmployeeForm;
